text: Irani Barbosa (22 September 1950 â€“ 23 December 2020) was a Brazilian politician. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1991 to 1995. He was elected as a member of the Democratic Movement. Barbosa was born in Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais. Barbosa died on 23 December 2020 from COVID-19 in Belo Horizonte at the age of 70. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians Category:Politicians from Minas Gerais
title: Irani Barbosa
